ad_text: Universal Sponsored LINC, a division of Universal Logistics, is seeking quality warehouse associates out of Racine, WI. Now is a great time to start with a growing company. We are offering DIRECT HIRE positions in a variety of departments, depending on experience. Questions? Call Rachel - 262-770-1261 Positions Available: Receiving Clerk (1st or 2nd shift) Cart Builder (1st Shift) Kanban Picker/Decanting (2nd Shift) Forklift (1st and 2nd Shift) Shift Times: 1st - 6:00am to 3:30pm 2nd - 3:00pm to 12:30am Benefits: Paid Time Off Starting Day 1 Paid Holidays Medical/Dental Insurance Jumpstart Your Career! Apply now

Universal Sponsored INCREASED RATES! Full Time Dock/Warehouse Workers Needed! Universal Logistics is seeking quality dock and warehouse workers for direct-hire /full-time positions out of our Tanner, AL facility. We are seeking aggressive, forward thinking and highly motivated candidates to work in a team environment. Now is a great time to join our growing operation! Apply in Person at: 5271 Endeavor Way Tanner, AL 35671 Or apply online at https://careers.universallogistics.com/ Select Industrial Worker as Position and Logistics Insights as Company Universal offers: · Full-time hours · Medical and Dental Insurance · Paid Time Off · Annual reviews Requirements: · Have previous forklift / warehouse experience (6 months) · Set example of strong productivity Jumpstart Your Career! Apply now

Universal Sponsored Seeking CDL Class A Yard Switchers to join the Universal team!! $5,000 SIGN ON BONUS (CDL A Only)! Questions? Call Jonathan at (586) 920-0100 ext 6318 Universal Apply now
